MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the  LL15 postcode area of Ruthin, affecting properties in Llanfair Dyffryn Clwyd and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:42AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on the network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 10.45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.53am on 5th of November 2020.
